headline: Lumax Auto shares soar 9% after large deal worth Rs 134.50 crore
paragraph: Around 30 lakh shares of Lumax Auto, representing a 4.4 percent stake in the company changed hands in the large deal.

headline: Nifty, Bank Nifty rollover data shows short bets building up, costs rising
paragraph: Nifty is expected to oscillate around 21,950 within a range of 75 points. A negative tilt is anticipated until it remains below 22,050. For Bank Nifty, the expected expiry range is between 45,800 and 46,200-46,300

headline: SoftBank sells 2% stake in Paytm amid regulatory crisis
paragraph: With the current sale, the Japanese investor's stake has been pared down to 2.83 percent in the fintech major.

headline: Mid-day Mood| Nifty, Sensex flat ahead of GDP data, banks under pressure
paragraph: Markets are cautious ahead of the release of India’s Q3 GDP data.

headline: Surprise slump in iron ore prices poses risk for India’s steel producers
paragraph: China’s property sector needs a more robust stimulus, barring which a shadow over iron ore prices may continue as steel-makers will taper output

headline: Juniper Hotels stock zooms 10% for second consecutive day, Mcap crosses Rs 9,500 crore
paragraph: Juniper Hotels is a luxury hotel development and ownership company that runs hotels under the “Hyatt” brand. The company holds a portfolio of seven hotels and serviced apartments with a total of 1,836 rooms.

headline: Nomura expects 10% surge in passenger vehicle sales in Feb
paragraph: Waiting periods for popular PV models have largely have come down in some cases during the month of February.

headline: Exicom Tele-Systems IPO: Issue subscribed 38 times, retail portion booked 81x on Day 3
paragraph: Exicom Tele-Systems IPO: The Gurugram-headquartered EV charger manufacturer intends to raise Rs 429 crore through its maiden public issue

headline: Citi bullish on Bank of Baroda stock, sees 11% upside; downgrades SBI, PNB to 'sell'
paragraph: Stock prices of BoB, SBI, and PNB declined up to 1 percent on February 29 following weak market sentiment on the day of monthly F&O expiry

headline: NBCC gains on sale of commercial space in New Delhi for Rs 272.68 crore
paragraph: The commercial space sold through e-auction is a part of redevelopment project being executed by NBCC for AIIMS Delhi.

headline: Bharat Highways InvIT IPO subscribed 37% on Day 2 so far; should you subscribe to the Rs 2,500-cr issue?
paragraph: Bharat Highways InvIT IPO: The price band of the issue, which opened for subscription on February 28 and will close on March 1, 2024, has been fixed at Rs 98-100 per share

headline: Bajaj Auto trades ex-buyback, stock falls 4%
paragraph: As per analysts at Nuvama, the acceptance ratio of the share buyback could be in the range of 4-10 percent; the buyback is likely to be completed within the next 15 days

headline: Mukka Proteins IPO booked 39%, retail portion 67% on debut day
paragraph: Mukka Proteins IPO: The company aims to raise Rs 224 crore through the fresh issue of 8 crore shares

headline: How late-stage PE firms see market and elevated valuations impact exit strategies
paragraph: Senior PE executives share insights into the market segments they are bullish on, key trend of founder transitions, and the challenge of expensive valuations.

headline: GPT Healthcare lists at 16% premium to IPO price: Should you buy more, hold, or sell?
paragraph: GPT Healthcare stock started trading at Rs 215 on the NSE and at Rs 216.15 on the BSE against the IPO price of Rs 186

headline: Brightcom Group tanks 7% after Sebi refuses to lift restrictions on promoter
paragraph: SEBI had issued an interim order on August 22, 2023, and on February 28, the markets regulator issued a confirmatory order, confirming the directions it gave for 20 of the 25 noticees in the Brightcom Group case.

headline: Suzlon Energy trades down 3% despite winning 30-MW wind power project
paragraph: Suzlon Energy Share Price: The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 50.72 and a 52-week low of Rs 6.96 on 02 February, 2024 and 28 March, 2023, respectively.

headline: Meet IIT Madras alumnus Sridhar Ramaswamy, the new Snowflake CEO
paragraph: The company said Ramaswamy has been chosen for the role to deliver on the "huge opportunity ahead in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML)."

headline: Daily Voice: This CIO bullish on power, clean tech sectors, believes BFS undervalued now
paragraph: Furthermore, the AI (artificial intelligence) Revolution, led by companies like NVIDIA, presents significant growth potential, says Vikas Gupta.

headline: GuruSpeak| Anjeneya Manoj Kumar’s secret to trading Big Boy Covered Calls
paragraph: Manoj Kumar typically purchases one lot of shares and sells Out-of-The-Money (OTM) call options, with the strike price exceeding 4 percent of the share price. Essentially, he has created a Covered Call strategy, which provides steady income.

headline: Jio Financial Services gains 3% on news of inclusion in Nifty Next 50
paragraph: Adani Power, Indian Railway Finance Corporation, Power Finance Corporation and REC are the other counters that will be included in the Nifty Next 50 index.

headline: ICICI Sec trades lower after Sebi warning on merchant banking books
paragraph:
ICICI Securities added that the "event had no financial, operation or other activities of the Company
pursuant to the administrative warning letter."

headline: GPT Healthcare stock makes decent debut, lists at 16% premium to IPO price
paragraph: GPT Healthcare IPO: The stock opened at Rs 215 on the NSE and at Rs 216.15 on the BSE against the issue price of Rs 186

headline: Man Industries shares up nearly 3% on orders win worth Rs 555 crore
paragraph: The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 459 and a 52-week low of Rs 83.21 on 05 February, 2024 and 16 March, 2023, respectively.

headline: Venus Pipes rally 8% on fittings business foray, capacity expansion
paragraph: Fittings play a crucial role in industrial piping by enabling fluid or gas connection, redirection, and control. The company's entry into this sector aims to strengthen its position in the industrial business.
